fullText: Harvey Fierstein's new play Casa Valentina offers a touching portrait of a group of heterosexual cross-dressers who gather at a resort in the Catskills in the early 1960s.
dtliExcerpt: Harvey Fierstein's new play Casa Valentina offers a touching portrait of a group of heterosexual cross-dressers who gather at a resort in the Catskills in the early 1960s.
